name: PAUL V. BEDDOE GOVERNMENT AFFAIRS, LLC (ON BEHALF OF THE COUNTY OF LOS ANGELES)
description: Government affairs consulting firm representing the County of Los Angeles, California.
sampleDescriptions: Support the Medicaid program and the Affordable Care Act. Support federal programs that help local public health services. Support federal programs that help local mental health services.

Advance federal policies and funding to support the county departments which provide public health, mental health and health care services to its residents.
